turns.answer:
Mafia is a very common name in the UK. Mafia is a common name for you and the player who is Mafia knows the name and is the winner of the game. You don't have to explain it.

turns.answer: I was playing as a mob boss and did not have access to any weapons that I owned, so I asked for my name and address. I was given no info, but I had a friend on a mob. I did not hear any
